1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Musa Al-Ash'ari that:The Messenger of Allah performed ablution and wiped over his socks and his sandals

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمَسْحِ عَلَى الْجَوْرَبَيْنِ وَالنَّعْلَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: Concerning wiping over the socks and the sandals
